data.name: Uneven dancers
data.description:
Given a list of the heights of the participants of a dance contest, you must make couples with the following criteria:

  The first couple will be the shortest dancer with the tallest, the second couple will be the second shortest dancer with the second tallest and so on.
  
  The result should be a list of two item tuples, containing the heights of each couple of dancers. If the number of dancers is uneven, then the last dancer to be picked will not compete

Examples:

      [1.5,1.6,2.0,1.8] -> [(1.5, 2.0), (1.6, 1.8)]
      
      [1.7,1.4,1.9,2.1,1.5] -> [(1.4, 2.1), (1.5, 1.9)] 
      
The given list contains at least 2 values, an all values are numbers between 1.4 an 2.1 (heights in meters)
